channel.title: Curl on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Curl on TLDRBins

item.title: Advance curl
item.description: Advance curl # POST url-encoded data curl --data-urlencode '<QUERY_STRING>' <TARGET> # Put the POST data to url and use GET curl -G --data-urlencode '<QUERY_STRING>' <TARGET> # PUT a file curl -X PUT <TARGET>/<FILE> -d @<FILE> # PUT a file (with creds) curl -X PUT -u '<USER>:<PASSWORD>' <TARGET>/<FILE> -d @<FILE> # Put a file as raw binary format (preserve newlines and control characters) curl -X PUT <TARGET>/<FILE> --data-binary @<FILE> # POST a file with form param 'file' curl -X POST -F 'file=@<FILE>;type=<APPLICATION_TYPE>;filename=<FILE>' <TARGET> # POST a file in raw-text format (not as attachment) with form param 'file' curl -X POST -F 'file=<<FILE>' <TARGET> # Not to handle sequences of '/.
